<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// increase to accommodate them.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This really ends up using the requested number of SGPRs + number</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of reserved special registers in total. Theoretically you could re-use</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the last input registers for these special registers, but this would</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// require a lot of complexity to deal with the weird aliasing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InputNumSGPRs = PreloadedSGPRs;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Requested &amp;&amp; Requested &lt; InputNumSGPRs)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make sure requested value is compatible with values implied by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Requested &amp;&amp; Requested &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcnsubtarget/#acf6141c742569e20d289c523560f8b00">getMaxNumSGPRs</a>(WavesPerEU.first, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">      Requested = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
